name: Validate invite token - No Auth
fullName: SLOT FINANCE - Users - QA/User/Groups/Validate invite token#Validate invite token - No Auth
description:
If user_exists is false, the user must create an account before they can accept or reject an invite.  

If user_exists is true, the user has to be logged in to accept or reject an invite.
descriptionHtml:

If user_exists is true, the user has to be logged in to accept or reject an invite.
